artist: Torii Kotondo; Publisher: Sakai Shōkichi; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō
inscription: 昭和四年十月 {Shōwa yonen jūgatsu} (October 1929)
markings: red artist's seal: 言人 {Kotondo} | embossed publisher seal: 酒井 川口 合板 {Sakai Kawaguchi gōban} (Sakai Kawaguchi joint publication) | on back, label: 外国行貮百枚限絶版　第百二十一號　鳥居言人 {gaikoku iki nihyaku mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakunijūichi gō, Torii Kotondo} (limited edition of 200 for foreign export, number 121, Torii Kotondo) | stamp: MADE IN JAPAN
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
title: Combing Hair
